chapter.title: Multi Context example using the Spring Framework
chapter.para: Please read the sample prerequistes before following these instructions.

section.title: Introduction
section.para: This is a very similar example compared to simple-command example. Only difference is that instead of asking container to execute a shell command, a Spring Application context is started and a defined bean method inside of it is executed.
The example code is located in the sample repository under the basic/multi-context.
